projectDesc.p: The project DHARMA has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement no 809994).

prefixDef.p: Public URIs with the prefix bib to point to a Zotero Group Library named ERC-DHARMA whose data are open to the public.
Internal URIs using the part prefix to point to person elements in the DHARMA_IdListMembers_V01.xmlfile.

revisionDesc.change: Additional global changes for compatibility with DHARMA
Updating toward the encoding template v03

Initial import: harmonising file structure with DHARMA inscription template v02. Text and comments as inherited from the Siddham archive of January 2019, unless otherwise indicated (by a name and date in the comment). Comments are offered "as is" and do not represent a thoroughly considered or researched opinion.

div.p:
d riṣṭaM . siddhaM . svast
a i nandivarddhanā T . Agni-ṣṭomāptoryyāmokthya-ṣoḍaśy-atirātra-
vājapeya-br̥has
y p ati-sava-sādyaskra-catur-aśvamedha-yājinaḥ viṣṇuvr̥ddha-
sagotrasya
samrāṭ samrājo vākātakānām mahārāja-śrī-pravarasenasya sūno ḥ sūno ḥ
Atyanta -svāmi-mahā-bhairava-bhaktasya ||
asaṁ aṁsa -bhāra-sanniveśita-śiva-liṅgo
dvahana-śiva-suparituṣṭa-samutpādita-rāja-vaṁśānāM parākkramādhigata-bhāgī
ratthy-amala-jala-mūrddhābhiṣiktānāṁ daśāśvamedh-āvabhr̥tha-snātānā ṁ bhāraśivānāṁ
mahārāja-śrī-bhavanāga-dauhitrasya gautam iputrasya putrasya | vākāṭa
kānām mahārāja-śrī-rudrasenasya sūnoḥ Atyanta-māheśvarasya ||
satyārjjava-kāruṇya-śauryya-vikkrama-naya-vinaya-māhātmya-dhīma tva-
pātra-ga ta-bha ktitva-dharmma-vijayitva-mano-nairmmalyādi-guṇais samu
petasya || varṣaśatam-abhivarddhamāna-kośa-daṇḍa-sādhana-santāna-
putrapautriṇa ḥ yudhiṣṭhira-vr̥tter vvākāṭakānām mahārāja-śrī-pr̥thivī
se
n ṇ asya sūnor-bbhagavataś cakkrapāṇeḫ prasād
ā o pārjjita-śrī-samudayasya
mahārāja-śr
i ī -rudrasenasya sūnoḥ mahārāj-ādhirāja-śrī-devagupta-
sutāy
a ā
ṁ prabhāvat īguptāy
a ā m utpannasya || śambhoḫ prasāda-dhr̥t
i a -kārtta
-yugasya | vākāṭakānām paramamāheśvara-mahārā ja-śrī-pravarasena
sya vacanā t|

supratiṣṭhāh
a ā re | umā-nadyā Apara-pārśve | ciṁcāpalyā
Uttare pārśve | bonthika-vāṭakasya | pūrvve pārśve | maṇḍuki-grāmasya
dakṣiṇe pārśve | kothuraka- nnāma-grāmaḥ kauṇḍinya-sagotra | taittirika-gaṇa-yāji
-kāluṭṭaka-brahmacāriṇe datt
ā a ḥ . yato smat-santakāḥ sarvvāddhyakṣa-niyoga-niyuktā
Ājñā-saṁcāri-kulaputrādhikr̥tāḥ bhaṭṭāś chātrāś ca vi
ṣ śr uta-pūrvvayājñ ayājñāpayi
tavyā

vi ditam astu vaḥ yathehāsmābhir ātmano dharmmāyur-bbala-vijayaiśvaryya-vi
vr̥ddhaye ihāmutra-hitārttham ātmānugrahāya vaijayike dha rmma-sthāne Apūrvva-da
t tyā udaka-pūrvvam atisr̥ṣṭaḥ . yathāsyopacitā ṁ pūrvva-rājānumatāñ cāturvvaidya-
grāma-maryyādā
n ṁ vitarāmas . tad yathā A-kara-dāy
i ī a-bhaṭa-cch
a ā tra-prāveśya ḥ A-pā
rampara-go-bal
a i vardda ḥ A-puṣpa-kṣīra-sandoha ḥ A-
v c ārāsana-carmm-āṅgāra ḥ A-la
vaṇa-klinna-klenī-khanakaḥ sarvva-v
e i ṣṭi-sa-parihāra-parihr̥taḥ sa-nidhiḥ
sopa nidhi ḥ sak lipt-opak lipta Ācandrāditya-kāl
i ī yaḥ putrapautrānu gā
mikaḥ bhuñjat
ā o na kenacid vyāghātayitavyaḥ sarvva-k
r̥ ri yābhis-saṁrakṣitavya ḥ
parivarddhayitavyaś c
ā a
. yaś cāsmac-chāsanam agaṇayamānaḥ svalpām api paribādhāṁ
kuryyāt
kārayita kārayeta vā tasya brāhmaṇair vveditasya sa-daṇḍa-nigrahaṁ kuryyāma||
Asmiṁś ca dharmmādara-karaṇe Atītāneka-rāja-
dattāṁ datta- sañcintana-paripālana ṁ
kr̥ta-puṇyānukīrttana-parihārārtthaṁ na kīrtta yāmaḥ . vyāsa-g
i ī taś cātra ślokaḫ pramāṇī-
karttavya ḥ

saṁvatsare dvitīye Aśvayuja-māsa-śukla-dvādaśyā ṁ|
cakkradeva ḥ dūtakaḥ . nāgavarmmaṇā likhita M|| ||
